We should not go in internals of Checks. Inyernal field could change at any time and it should not change type that users set.
This String... packageGroups)  should be String[] as it is array, that split by , and later each element converted to Pattern.  If user try to use , as part of regexp he will experience problems.  So we just have to explain all details in description of property.
